com.googlecode.aluminumproject.context.g11n
Class NameBasedResourceBundleProvider

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.aluminumproject.context.g11n.NameBasedResourceBundleProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
ResourceBundleProvider
public class NameBasedResourceBundleProvider
extends Object
implements ResourceBundleProvider

A resource bundle provider that delegates to the factory method that accepts a base name and a locale. The base name that will be used needs to be supplied when creating a name-based resource bundle provider; the locale is obtained by asking the current locale provider.

Constructor Summary
NameBasedResourceBundleProvider(String baseName)
          Creates a name-based resource bundle provider.

          Determines the resource bundle to use in a particular context.
